pkgmetadata.longdescription: Significance Tests for Palaeoenvironmental Reconstructions // Several tests of quantitative palaeoenvironmental reconstructions from microfossil assemblages, including the null model tests of the statistically significant of reconstructions developed by Telford and Birks (2011) doi:10.1016/j.quascirev.2011.03.002, and tests of the effect of spatial autocorrelation on transfer function model performance using methods from Telford and Birks (2009) doi:10.1016/j.quascirev.2008.12.020 and Trachsel and Telford (2016) doi:10.5194/cp-12-1215-2016. Age-depth models with generalized mixed-effect regression from Heegaard et al (2005) doi:10.1191/0959683605hl836rr are also included.
